titles.title: A resolution to request the printing of a Senate document.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 3/4/1988--Introduced. Provides for the printing of "The INF Treaty and the Future of the Alliance - Report by a Senate delegation to five NATO Countries, led by Majority Leader Robert C. Byrd, February 6-14, 1988" as a Senate document, including additional copies for the use of Senators.
